body:
Just to let you all know, Twitch was unfortunatly hacked today: http://techcrunch.com/2015/03/23/twitch-passwords-data-breach-hack/ You are now required to change your password and I would kindly incline you to do so!

-Riley
body_tagged:

title: Reset Your Twitch Passwords

replies.body:
Just saying you are being forced to change your password :P
Twitch deactivated all passwords and are making us change it xD

replies.body: Oh Twitched forced you to change your password.  That is a relief.  I thought I was hacked so I dis banned my account xD  Thanks for the heads up :D
